name: Rosewill RC-402 100 Mb/s Ethernet PCI Network Adapter
Features: [Chipset: Realtek RTL8100c, ACPI and PCI power management Ver. 1.1 compliant., Provides two independent long FIFOs with 2K bytes each for transmission and receiving., OS Supports: Supports ODI, NDIS, Windows 98/98SE/ME/2000/XP/NT 4.0/Vista 32/64bit, Plug n Play support for Win7 and Win8(32/64 bit), UNIX and Linux.]
